<br>

* All servers use Pure NVMe SSD disks and ECC RAM. 
* Softaculous auto-installer, Node.js & Python are enabled. 
* All servers utilize Litespeed web server & Cloudlinux OS. 
* Free Let's encrypt SSL certificates.
* Jailed SSH access on eligible plans, please create a ticket after order to enable.
* Full Daily Backups are included.
* All accounts come with unlimited sub-domains, databases, and Domain pointers (alias).
* 99.9% Uptime Guarantee
* Cloudlinux limits: 
LA & DE: 200% CPU, 2GB ram, 4096 IOPS, 50EP, 200NPROC 
SG: 100% Ryzen CPU, 1GB ram, 4096 IOPS, 80EP, 140NPROC

> See shared hosting plans -> https://my.webhorizon.in/order/main/index/ssd-shared
> Coupon - SHARED-41


<br>

------------------------

------------------------------

**Payment Methods**

PayPal payments are available. We recommend using Cards via Stripe Payments.
Also Bitcoin & Monero payments are supported.
Billing currencies: USD, EUR, GBP or INR.
All mentioned prices are recurring. 

<br>

**For people living in India/having a card issued in India/billing address in India - Order using INR currency only**  - 
[Shared Hosting link](https://my.webhorizon.in/order/main/index/ssd-shared "Shared Hosting link") coupon SHARED-41

Razorpay(Cards, UPI, Netbanking, GooglePay etc), Stripe payments.
